answers.answer: Hi,It is important to know if you have been evaluated for peripheral neuropathy. Peripheral neuropathy can occur due to diabetes, B 12 deficiency and thyroid dysfunction.I would suggest you to take B complex supplements and see if they help with your symptoms.Also did you undergo MRI of brain or spine?MRI of lower back will also help since you have pain on sitting on your left buttock, nerve compression should be ruled out in that area.

HiI do take B12 vitamin and medication for my thyroid. I've been tested for diabetes, lupis, MS, Lyme Disease, checked for PAD nothing was found. An MRI was done on my brain, neck, and done a ultrasoned on my right thyroid, did a VER (check vision and nerves in feet), did a spinal tap and nothing was found.It first started out with a tingling and tightening in left leg and arm in 2005. Now it's to the point I have this pain on my left side of the body at times that goes from my ear to my toes. Numbness and pain on left cheek and ear. Hard to set on left buttocks.Can you help?ThanksBady Pain

question: HiI have this pain on my left side of the body at times that goes from my ear to my toes. Numbness and pain on left cheek and ear. Hard to set on left buttocks. I've been to a Neurologist and had MRI and the could not find anyting. I've also tried a Chiropractor, but that seemed to make it worse. Could you help me with my pain?ThanksBady Pain
title: Pain on left side of Body
